body_html:
I'm not sure we want to modify the current behaviour of reshape.

The current contract is that if the resize operation has happened, then the resized tensor is contiguous (except if the tensor already has the right shape, in which case the resize is a no-op).

I'm afraid that modifying this code might break code in a bunch of places.

I'm afraid that modifying this code might break code in a bunch of places.
body:
I'm not sure we want to modify the current behaviour of reshape.

The current contract is that if the resize operation has happened, then the resized tensor is contiguous (except if the tensor already has the right shape, in which case the resize is a no-op).

I'm afraid that modifying this code might break code in a bunch of places.
